Text:
Hi, not sure if you check your uploads regularly but i'm have problems with this torrent. 

Can you explain to me how this is supposed to work and what i am meant to do in order to play this game...thanks

No-Cd do not work after patches, tired all versions, always asks for disc or serial but there are none, cant find any either, you need to put the games keygen or serials with it if it wont play without it or patch the ISO. Fast DL though!
